author: ebourg
msg: - moved the userguide and the 1.2 howtos in separate directories
- added a 'Javadoc archive' page and removed the links from the menu
- added a 'Development' section in the menu similar to other commons components
- added a description for some of the releases on the changes report
- reverted the maven-xdoc-plugin to 1.8 to fix the page titles (navigation.xml title + page title instead of page title + nav title)
- changed the page title to be more descriptive
